meanings.definition: Hooliganisms: behavior that is rowdy, disruptive, or violent
meanings.sent1: The hooliganisms at the party led to broken furniture and upset neighbors.
meanings.sent2: The police were called to handle the hooliganisms happening in the park.
meanings.sent3: The hooliganisms of the children running around the store made the customers laugh.
meanings.sent4: His hooliganisms on the soccer field earned him a red card from the referee.
meanings.sent5: The hooliganisms of the fans during the match were out of control.

meanings.definition: Hooliganisms: actions or attitudes characteristic of a hooligan
meanings.sent1: The hooliganisms of the troublemaker were evident in his graffiti around town.
meanings.sent2: The school principal addressed the hooliganisms of the students with a stern warning.
meanings.sent3: Despite his small size, his hooliganisms made him seem larger than life.
meanings.sent4: Her hooliganisms in the classroom disrupted the learning environment for everyone.
meanings.sent5: The hooliganisms of the group of teenagers were a concern for the local community.
